doc.field: description Tere Sang Yaara lyrics in hindi and English from Rustom.

Hindi Lyrics > Rustom > Tere Sang Yaara Following is the lyrics of ' Tere Sang Yaara' song from hindi movie 'Rustom'. Song: Tere Sang Yaara Movie: Rustom Singer(s): Atif Aslam Music By: Arko Lyricist(s): Manoj Muntashir Tere Sang Yaara Lyrics from Rustom
Ohh karam khudaya hai Tuzhe muzhse milaaya hai Tuzhpe maarke toh Muzhe jeena aaya hai Ohh tere sang yaara khusah rang bahara Tu raat deewani main zaarat sittara Ohh tere sang yaara khusah rang bahara Main tera ho jau joh karde tu ishaara Maine choode hai baaki saare raaste Bass aaya hoon tere paas re Meri aankhoon main tera naam hai pehchhan le Sab kuch mereliye tere baad hai Sau baatonki eik baat hai Main na jaaunga tuzhe kabhi choad ke yeh jaan le Ohh karam khudaya hai Tuzhe muzhse milaaya hai Tuzhpe maarke toh Muzhe jeena aaya hai Ohh tere sang yaara khusah rang bahara Main behata mussafir tu thehera kinaara Ohh tere sang yaara khusah rang bahara Other 'Rustom' Songs: 1: Tere Sang Yaara Get Weekly Movie Updates Want to suggest any changes to the lyrics of ' Tere Sang Yaara' from 'Rustom'?
